description: Gov. John Bel Edwards said he will extend the state's stay-at-home order until April 30 as the numbers of coronavirus cases and deaths surge.
title: Louisiana coronavirus: 2,700 new cases and 37 new deaths are reported in 1 day
title_page: Louisiana coronavirus: 2,700 new cases and 37 new deaths are reported in 1 day - CNN
maintext:
(CNN) Louisiana Gov. John Bel Edwards said he will extend the state's stay-at-home order until April 30 as the numbers of coronavirus cases and deaths surge.
The announcement Thursday came the same day Louisiana reported more than 2,700 new cases of coronavirus and 37 new deaths.
The state's health department said about 95% of the new positive test results came from tests conducted in commercial labs.
